title: COVID-19 in Queensland
author: C=Au; O=The State
cleaned_text: COVID-19 in Queensland Traffic light system ends The COVID-19 traffic light system is no longer in use. [Read more](https://www.qld.gov.au/health/conditions/health-alerts/coronavirus-covid-19/health-advice/traffic-light-advice).
